headline: Psalm of the Agony of Waiting
description: A psalm written in the tension between departure and obedience, articulating the discipline of waiting, the ache of unfinished movement, and the prayer to remain present while the future presses forward.
author: Aleksandr

fieldDefinitions.phase: The Bloom phase expressing the spiritual and psychological state embodied in the work.

motifMap.meaning: Obedience without movement; endurance under delayed fulfillment
The fracture between anticipation and presence
The dual awareness of present hardship and promised refuge

associatedMedia.description: Text-only Substack post; no associated images.
